string-array.name: tempe_high
string-array.item: Do I look like a cactus to you? Turn on the damn AC!"
"May both sides of your pillow be as hot as I am"

string-array.name: temp_low
string-array.item: "I'm freezing in here. Stop being poor and pay for the heating!"
"If only you were as cool as I am.."

string-array.name: general_bad
string-array.item: "Go make some Oale and leave plants and potting for others"
"Go kill yourself before you kill me"

resources.string: "I will spare you today, my slave"
